bibl.title: How to Build in Marshy Lands? - Some Remarks on Brick Constructions in Roman and Byzantine Pelusium.
Proceedings of the Fifth Central European Conference of Egyptologists. Egypt 2009: Perspectives of Research. Pułtusk, 22-24 June 2009

bibl.seg: MAŚLAK Szymon, How to Build in Marshy Lands? - Some Remarks on Brick Constructions in Roman and Byzantine Pelusium.

Joanna POPIELSKA-GRZYBOWSKA and Jadwiga IWASZCZUK (Edd.), Proceedings of the Fifth Central European Conference of Egyptologists. Egypt 2009: Perspectives of Research. Pułtusk, 22-24 June 2009 = Acta Archaeologica Pultuskiensia. II (Pułtusk, 2009) pp. 127-142 et figg. 52-55.
